participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, loves to explore new things and make friends.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and hardworking, enjoys stability and has a soft spot for animals.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.
